alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 10 at 4:08PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Johns and southeastern Duval Counties through 445 PM EST... At 408 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bayard, or 7 miles south of Unf, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ponte Vedra Beach, Jacksonville Beach, Atlantic Beach, Neptune Beach, Palm Valley, Sawgrass, Bayard and San Pablo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
